products.name: Rainwater Harvesting Tank 5000L
products.description: High-capacity polyethylene water storage tank designed for rainwater harvesting systems. UV-resistant and suitable for above-ground installation.
products.metaDescription: Premium 5000-liter rainwater storage tank with UV protection. Perfect for residential and commercial rainwater harvesting systems.

products.name: Drip Irrigation Kit - 100 sq.m
products.description: Complete drip irrigation kit suitable for gardens up to 100 square meters. Includes all necessary components for water-efficient irrigation.
products.metaTitle: 100sqm Drip Irrigation Kit | Water-Efficient Garden Irrigation
products.metaDescription: Complete drip irrigation system for 100 square meter gardens. Save up to 70% water with programmable timer and pressure-compensating drippers.

products.name: First Flush Diverter 90mm
products.description: Essential component for rainwater harvesting that diverts the first contaminated water flow, ensuring cleaner water storage.
products.metaTitle: 90mm First Flush Diverter | Rainwater Filter System
products.metaDescription: Automatic first flush diverter for cleaner rainwater collection. Self-cleaning design for maintenance-free operation.

products.name: Rotary Sprinkler System - 6 Zone
products.description: Professional-grade rotary sprinkler system with 6-zone capability for large lawns and landscapes up to 500 square meters.
products.metaTitle: 6-Zone Smart Rotary Sprinkler System | Professional Irrigation
products.metaDescription: Smart WiFi-enabled 6-zone rotary sprinkler system for large landscapes. Weather-based scheduling with mobile app control.

products.name: Solar Fountain Pump 40W
products.description: Energy-efficient solar-powered fountain pump perfect for garden ponds, water features, and decorative fountains.
products.metaTitle: 40W Solar Fountain Pump | Eco-Friendly Water Features
products.metaDescription: Solar-powered fountain pump with battery backup. Perfect for garden ponds and water features with no electricity costs.

products.name: Underground Rainwater Tank 10000L
products.description: Large-capacity underground rainwater storage tank made from reinforced polyethylene. Ideal for commercial and large residential properties.
products.metaDescription: Heavy-duty underground rainwater storage tank for commercial properties. 15-year warranty with integrated pump chamber.

products.name: Micro Spray Irrigation Kit - 200 sq.m
products.description: Precision micro spray irrigation system designed for vegetable gardens, flower beds, and greenhouse applications.
products.metaTitle: 200sqm Micro Spray Irrigation Kit | Precision Garden Watering
products.metaDescription: Precision micro spray irrigation for vegetable gardens and greenhouses. Adjustable patterns with uniform water distribution.

products.name: Pond Filtration System 5000L
products.description: Complete biological and mechanical filtration system for ornamental ponds up to 5000 liters. Maintains crystal clear water.
products.metaTitle: 5000L Pond Filtration System | Crystal Clear Water Features
products.metaDescription: Complete pond filtration with UV sterilizer for crystal clear water. 3-stage bio-mechanical filtration for healthy ponds.

products.name: Roof Water Harvesting Complete Kit
products.description: All-in-one roof water harvesting kit including gutters, downpipes, first flush diverter, and storage tank for typical residential homes.
products.metaTitle: Complete Roof Water Harvesting Kit | Turnkey Rainwater Solution
products.metaDescription: Complete roof rainwater harvesting system with professional installation. Includes tank, gutters, and filtration for homes up to 150sqm.

products.name: Smart Irrigation Controller - 12 Zone
products.description: Advanced WiFi-enabled irrigation controller with weather intelligence and smartphone app control for up to 12 zones.
products.metaTitle: 12-Zone Smart Irrigation Controller | WiFi Garden Control
products.metaDescription: Smart WiFi irrigation controller with weather intelligence. Control 12 zones remotely with water usage tracking and seasonal adjustments.

products.name: Garden Waterfall Kit - 3 Tier
products.description: Natural stone-look 3-tier waterfall kit with integrated LED lighting. Creates a stunning focal point for any garden.
products.metaTitle: 3-Tier Garden Waterfall Kit | LED Water Feature
products.metaDescription: Stunning 3-tier waterfall with integrated LED lighting. Natural stone finish with easy modular assembly for beautiful gardens.

products.name: Rainwater Pump System - Automatic
products.description: Fully automatic pressure pump system for rainwater harvesting with mains water backup and intelligent switching.
products.metaTitle: Automatic Rainwater Pump System | Smart Water Management
products.metaDescription: Intelligent rainwater pump with automatic mains backup. Digital control with dry-run protection for reliable water supply.
